help-file.title: SCOUNDREL
help-file.content:
The scoundrel, long coveting the ways of its brethren, the assassins and thieves has trained and extended some similar traits of their kind. Their ability now far exceeds the limits of their other Bard counterparts, and are now able to rise and excel in these skills to a higher level.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Dodge (Extended) 31st level: Backstab (Extended) 52nd level: Trip
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Enhanced Flee
